member.name: T:Acontplus.S3Application.Configuration.S3StorageOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for S3 storage service including performance and resilience settings.

member.name: F:Acontplus.S3Application.Configuration.S3StorageOptions.SectionName
member.summary: Configuration section name for S3 storage options.

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Configuration.S3StorageOptions.MaxRequestsPerSecond
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of requests per second to prevent throttling. Default is 100 requests/second. AWS S3 limits: 3,500 PUT/COPY/POST/DELETE and 5,500 GET/HEAD per prefix per second.

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Configuration.S3StorageOptions.TimeoutSeconds
member.summary: Gets or sets the request timeout in seconds. Default is 60 seconds.

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Configuration.S3StorageOptions.MaxRetries
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of retry attempts for transient failures. Default is 3 retries.

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Configuration.S3StorageOptions.RetryBaseDelayMs
member.summary: Gets or sets the base delay in milliseconds for exponential backoff between retries. Default is 500ms.

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Configuration.S3StorageOptions.Region
member.summary: Gets or sets the AWS region endpoint (e.g., "us-east-1", "eu-west-1").

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Configuration.S3StorageOptions.DefaultBucketName
member.summary: Gets or sets the default bucket name for operations.

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Configuration.S3StorageOptions.ForcePathStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to use path-style addressing for S3 buckets. Default is false (uses virtual-hosted-style).

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Configuration.S3StorageOptions.EnableMetrics
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to enable request metrics and logging. Default is false.

member.name: T:Acontplus.S3Application.Extensions.S3ServiceCollectionExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for registering S3 storage services in the dependency injection container.

member.name: M:Acontplus.S3Application.Extensions.S3ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddS3Storage(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Registers S3 storage services with default configuration.

member.name: M:Acontplus.S3Application.Extensions.S3ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddS3Storage(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration)
member.summary: Registers S3 storage services with configuration from appsettings.

member.name: M:Acontplus.S3Application.Extensions.S3ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddS3Storage(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Action{Acontplus.S3Application.Configuration.S3StorageOptions})
member.summary: Registers S3 storage services with explicit configuration action.
member.param: Action to configure S3 storage options.

member.name: T:Acontplus.S3Application.Interfaces.IS3StorageService
member.summary: Defines a contract for AWS S3 storage operations, including async CRUD, retrieval, and presigned URL generation.

member.name: M:Acontplus.S3Application.Interfaces.IS3StorageService.UploadAsync(Acontplus.S3Application.Models.S3ObjectCustom)
member.summary: Uploads a new object to S3 asynchronously.
member.returns: A response with status and metadata.

member.name: M:Acontplus.S3Application.Interfaces.IS3StorageService.UpdateAsync(Acontplus.S3Application.Models.S3ObjectCustom)
member.summary: Updates an existing object in S3 asynchronously.
member.returns: A response with status and metadata.

member.name: M:Acontplus.S3Application.Interfaces.IS3StorageService.DeleteAsync(Acontplus.S3Application.Models.S3ObjectCustom)
member.summary: Deletes an object from S3 asynchronously.
member.returns: A response with status and metadata.

member.name: M:Acontplus.S3Application.Interfaces.IS3StorageService.GetObjectAsync(Acontplus.S3Application.Models.S3ObjectCustom)
member.summary: Retrieves an object from S3 asynchronously.
member.returns: A response with file content and metadata.

member.name: M:Acontplus.S3Application.Interfaces.IS3StorageService.DoesObjectExistAsync(Acontplus.S3Application.Models.S3ObjectCustom)
member.summary: Checks if an object exists in S3 asynchronously.
member.returns: True if the object exists; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Acontplus.S3Application.Interfaces.IS3StorageService.GetPresignedUrlAsync(Acontplus.S3Application.Models.S3ObjectCustom,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a presigned URL for an S3 object asynchronously.
member.param: The S3 object for which to generate the URL.
The expiration time in minutes for the URL.
member.returns: A response containing the presigned URL.

member.name: T:Acontplus.S3Application.Models.AwsCredentials
member.summary: Represents AWS credentials required for S3 operations.

member.summary: Gets or sets the AWS access key.

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Models.AwsCredentials.Secret
member.summary: Gets or sets the AWS secret key.

member.name: T:Acontplus.S3Application.Models.S3ObjectCustom
member.summary: Represents a strongly-typed S3 object, including content, metadata, and AWS configuration.

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Models.S3ObjectCustom.Region
member.summary: Gets the AWS region for the S3 bucket.

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Models.S3ObjectCustom.BucketName
member.summary: Gets the S3 bucket name.

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Models.S3ObjectCustom.Content
member.summary: Gets the file content as a byte array.

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Models.S3ObjectCustom.S3ObjectKey
member.summary: Gets the S3 object key (path/filename in the bucket).

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Models.S3ObjectCustom.S3ObjectUrl
member.summary: Gets the full S3 object URL.

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Models.S3ObjectCustom.AwsCredentials
member.summary: Gets the AWS credentials for this object.

member.summary: Gets the MIME type of the file.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using configuration.
member.param: The application configuration containing S3 and AWS settings.

member.summary: Initializes the S3 object with file content and metadata from an uploaded file.
member.param: The S3 folder path or prefix.

member.summary: Initializes the S3 object with an existing S3 object key.

member.summary: Sets the file content and optionally the MIME type.
member.param: The file content as a byte array.

member.summary: Disposes the object and clears sensitive data.

member.summary: Finalizer to ensure resources are released.

member.name: T:Acontplus.S3Application.Models.S3Response
member.summary: Represents the result of an S3 storage operation, including status, message, and optional file content.

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Models.S3Response.StatusCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP-like status code for the operation (e.g., 200, 201, 404, 500).

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Models.S3Response.Message
member.summary: Gets or sets a message describing the result or error.

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Models.S3Response.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the file content as a byte array (for downloads).

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Models.S3Response.ContentType
member.summary: Gets or sets the MIME type of the file (for downloads).

member.name: P:Acontplus.S3Application.Models.S3Response.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the file name or presigned URL (for presigned requests).

member.name: T:Acontplus.S3Application.Services.S3StorageService
member.summary: Provides a scalable, resilient implementation of for AWS S3 storage operations. Features: connection pooling, retry policies with exponential backoff, rate limiting, and proper resource management.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of with configuration and logging.

member.summary: Gets or creates a pooled S3 client for the specified credentials and region.

member.summary: Creates retry policy for transient S3 errors with exponential backoff.

member.summary: Enforces rate limiting to prevent AWS throttling.

member.name: M:Acontplus.S3Application.Services.S3StorageService.CleanupOldTimestamps
member.summary: Removes timestamps older than the rate limit window.

member.summary: Uploads a new object to S3 asynchronously with retry policy and rate limiting.
member.returns: A response with status and metadata.

member.summary: Updates an existing object in S3 asynchronously with retry policy and rate limiting.
member.returns: A response with status and metadata.

member.summary: Deletes an object from S3 asynchronously with retry policy and rate limiting.

member.summary: Retrieves an object from S3 asynchronously with retry policy and rate limiting.
member.returns: A response with file content and metadata.

member.summary: Checks if an object exists in S3 asynchronously with retry policy and rate limiting.
member.returns: True if the object exists; otherwise, false.
